sentences.english: The results of regional tests for two years and production tests showed that its yield was much higher than that of the CK, Xintian 501.
sentences.chinese: 在兩年的區域試驗和生產試驗中比對照品種增產顯著。

sentences.english: Layer is a method for propagating crops.
sentences.chinese: 壓條是糧食增產的一種方式。

sentences.english: These economic benefits were made possible in large part because both China and the United States embraced freer trade.
sentences.chinese: 這些高增產率得益於中美雙方的自由貿易。

sentences.english: Results showed that drip fertilization had the significant effects on yield.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，滴灌隨水追肥技術有明顯的增產節肥作用。

sentences.english: Palygorskite coated urea can effectively improve the yield of spring wheat.
sentences.chinese: 坡縷石包衣尿素能有效促進春小麥增產。

sentences.english: To increase production and practise economy are the basic approach to raise the agrotechnical…
sentences.chinese: 增產和節約是提高農業技術經濟效果的基本途徑。

sentences.english: Our country must drive at increasing agricultural production.
sentences.chinese: 我國必須力求農業增產。

sentences.english: Soaking seeds combined with spraying in bloom stage could increase the production even more obviously.
sentences.chinese: 浸種並配合花期噴灑，則有更加明顯的增產效果。

sentences.english: As an example, research on rapeseed has shown great potential for improved yield and profit.
sentences.chinese: 舉例來說，油菜研究表明了巨大的增產增收潛力。

sentences.english: The N at jointing-booting stage increased yield evidently.
sentences.chinese: 拔節孕穗肥施氮比例增加，增產效果最好。

sentences.english: To reduce flux charging ratio is a important way for increasing production and reducing coke ratio of ferromanganese BF.
sentences.chinese: 減少入爐熔劑量是錳鐵高爐增產節焦的重要途徑。

sentences.english: Fracturing fluids and propping agents are the essential materials for CBM well fracturing to increase yield.
sentences.chinese: 壓裂液和支撐劑是煤層氣井壓裂增產措施的基本材料。

sentences.english: Results showed that mulched treatments had significant effect on increasing yield.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，秸稈覆蓋有明顯的增產效果。

sentences.english: Optimizing the reservoir stimulation is an issue concerning multi-target decision.
sentences.chinese: 油氣藏增產措施優選是一個多目標決策問題。

sentences.english: Technology must go into villages and peasant households for high yield and high efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 全面推進科技進村入戶，推廣增產增效技術。

sentences.english: The Party therefore suggested a renewed campaign to raise production and practise economy.
sentences.chinese: 因此黨提出重新開展增產節約運動。

definition: test planting/crop grown on a trial basis
agricultural worker/abbr. for 農業工人|农业工人/peasant and worker (in Marxism)
Saudi Arabia (Tw), abbr. for 沙烏地阿拉伯王國|沙乌地阿拉伯王国
